method.comment: /** Tries to get an instance's Context for use with additional decoration/injection. **/
/** Removes instances from the cache which should no longer be re-used. */
/** Immediately deactivates and removes all instances in the cache, regardless of scope. */

property.name: PruningInterval
property.propertyComment: /** The interval between pruning attempts; the unit in which this is denominated is defined by the PruningUnit property. */

property.name: PruningUnit
property.propertyComment: /** Defines the uniit of measure for the PruningInterval proeprty. */

property.name: Pipeline
property.propertyComment: /** Gets the activation pipeline in use for this kernel */

property.name: Count
property.propertyComment: /** Gets the number of entries currently stored in the cache. */
